item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

goatee:

He didn’t even have proper training with that pistol, he shot the ground twice accidently. Someone needs to disarm these retarded Americans.

Again, you’re an idiot because of how little you know about how retarded it can get here. This is a new thing thats becoming more common called suicide by law enforcement, where you don’t have the nerve to kill yourself so you force police to kill you.

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:14, topic:373352”][quote author=Radeon link=topic=469369.msg3432006#msg3432006 date=1292438332]
I’m pretty sure he had a real gun, otherwise the suicide wouldn’t have worked.
[/quote]

Blanks can give quite a thud though. I’m not sure if it’s lethal, but firing a blank against your temple can hurt.[/quote]
If they were blanks we would have already known

item.title: Rambling gunman dead after opening fire
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

A biography on Duke’s Facebook page reads: “My Testament: Some people (the government sponsored media) will say I was evil, a monster (V)… no… I was just born poor in a country where the Wealthy manipulate, use, abuse, and economically enslave 95% of the population. Rich Republicans, Rich Democrats… same-same… rich… they take turns fleecing us… our few dollars… pyramiding the wealth for themselves. The 95%… the us, in US of A, are the neo slaves of the Global South. Our Masters, the Wealthy, do, as they like to us…”

Mike Jones, chief of security for the school system and a retired police officer, exchanged fire with Duke, who was wounded and rolled to the ground. Duke turned his gun on himself, dying of a fatal gunshot to the head, authorities said. Husfelt called Jones a “hero.”

item.title: Rambling gunman dead after opening fire
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

To clear up the gun law discussion:

Yes, it appears he already had a criminal record, and could not legally own a gun. Also, when he was convicted they DID confiscate any guns he may have owned. That’s just how it works.

The problem here is apparent though, this shows that criminals don’t obey gun laws (duh, they ARE CRIMINALS!!!), and it shows that ‘gun free zones’ like this school are deadly. In florida, where that happened, many law-abiding citizens have concealed carry permits, and carry a gun with them everywhere they go, except they follow the law and won’t carry their guns into a ‘gun free zone’ like a school, and criminals will. All that ‘gun free zones’ do is make a zone free of legal guns carried by law abiding citizens, which would never do anything illegal anyway, criminals actually prefer gun free zones because there is less of a threat to them there. If the crazy here had better aim he could have potentially killed a dozen people, and if states got rid of these ‘gun free zones’ then it could have been stopped much earlier and the only one potentially killed would have been the crazy.

And as to that women with the purse, a purse? Really? Don’t even try to hit someone if your going to do it with a purse, unless it’s filled with bricks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:2, topic:373352”]Woah

He had a criminal record already…

The second anyone is charged with anything they need to have their guns confiscated and restricted from buying them.[/quote]

mwiebelhaus:

Why does the video pause when he is getting shot…I watched all that for nothing EDIT: Oh nevermind video below it shows him getting shot. But yeah what the fuck, he should have had his weapons confiscated. Oh an also what was with the retarded bitch running in and trying to disarm him, someones been watching too many fucking movies.

I imagine the problem with confiscating the gun as mopar likes to point out is, no one will turn on American citizens if they have guns, be it a corrupt government, invading forces, or local law enforcement agencies collecting guns from people because they have a criminal record.
